resources.string:
"

About

EZTime Tracker is an Android app to record timespend on user definable activities/categories.

It records the time between "punch in" and "punch out" even if theapp is not running.

There are reports for details or totals by day, week, month, year and/orcategory that can be viewed or exported to textfile/email. You can alsouse your favorite SqLite-Databaseprogram to filter the data using thedatabase-view 'time_slice_report'.


Raw data can be exported to csv file on sd-card.

AndroidLlama + EZ TimeTracker = location based timetracking: i.e.aoutmatic recording when entering/leaving job/buro.

"

Add2GoZip
Version $versionName$
$about$

History

Improvements v0.1.2.20141111
  • Added Settings Activity to define zip-file.
  • Added this About-Box in Settings.

Improvements v0.1.1.20141109
  • Created share handler for Add To Zip without a gui.
  • Hardcoded zipfile /sdcard/copy/2go.zip.
  • Implemented view/send/sendto/send_multible for file and folder.
  • slf4j-android support.
  • .
  • .
  • Android independant zip enginge
    • Create folder/zip if it does not exist yet.
    • Rename file in zip if already exists.
    • slf4j support.
    • With j2se Unit- and Integration-Tests.

Links

  • Source code of current version of Add2GoZip at git repository@github.com
    https://github.com/k3bAdd2GoZip/
  • slf4j logging driver for android eu.lp0.slf4j:slf4j-android
    https://github.com/lp0/slf4j-android
  • slf4j logging for java org.slf4j:slf4j-api
    http://www.slf4j.org/
  • junit Testing support junit:junit
    http://junit.org/
  • powermock-mockito Testing support powermock-api-mockito
    https://code.google.com/p/powermock/
    https://github.com/mockito/mockito
